name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a seasoned Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive expertise, I excel in developing and integrating solutions utilizing **API**, **Cloud** services, and container orchestration technologies like **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. My foundation in **CI/CD** practices ensures smooth deployments and efficient development workflows. I am skilled at leveraging **AI** techniques, particularly in building solutions that incorporate LLM for enhanced functionalities.

I have a proven track record in supporting clients through **Technical Documentation** and providing exceptional **Customer Support**. My ability to communicate complex technical concepts to stakeholders enhances collaboration and drives project success. With extensive experience in healthcare and finance sectors, I have successfully led enterprise-grade projects, adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My strong background in using modern technologies like **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, enables me to build high-performance solutions that meet evolving client needs.
